import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Checkout = () => { let getCartdata = useSelector(state => state.GetCartReducer?.cartItem) || {} let requireddetail = getCartdata.map((item) => { return item.productData }) console.log(requireddetail) return ( <>

order summary

{requireddetail ? requireddetail.map((curr, index) => { return (
{curr?.Title} {curr.Title} ₹{curr?.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal} ₹{curr?.Price?.current_store_price?.$numberDecimal}
) }) : null}
Total Amount ₹200.00
Shipping Free
Final Amount ₹200.00
) } export default Checkout
